articles.title: What 'Turning Red' means to me as an AAPI parent - Entertainment Weekly News
articles.description: As EW editor revels in a run of films featuring strong Asian women, including Pixar's latest.
articles.content: Maybe real revolution happens in everyday suburbia. There's a scene in Pixar'sTurning Red (Disney+ out today) where the main character's mother invites her daughter's bestie over for dinner. She enth… [+3307 chars]

articles.author: Jeffrey Hutton (Regional Correspondent - The Straits Times)
articles.title: Cut off from family and savings, Russians on holiday in South-East Asia count the cost of war - The Star Online
articles.description: When he arrived in Bali nearly two weeks ago, after four days of quarantine in Jakarta, Viktor learnt that his adopted country of Russia had invaded his country of birth, Ukraine.
